name: Master Chen Wei
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Heraldic emblem: Master Chen Wei, simple geometry, 2-3 motifs tied to identity, seal/banner/coin variants, vector SVG, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Heraldic emblem for Master Chen Wei.
textPolicy: no words or inscriptions; pure iconography
revised_prompt: Create an image in the style of a detailed, painterly medieval-fantasy tabletop game. The scene should depict heroic characters adorned in culturally coherent gear, with no signs of modern technology, and designed with the accuracy of a Dungeons & Dragons setting. Include a heraldic emblem, simple in its geometry but featuring 2-3 motifs that tie into the identity of a character, presented in variations of a seal, banner, and coin. The color scheme should focus on aquatic fantasy realism with subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents. Use hues of teals, deep blues, and sea-greens, highlighted with pearl. The materials should give the impression of pressure-dome designs. All elements should have a consistent painterly style, no modern signage, no photoreal CGI, and no blooming glare. Also, avoid including any embedded text or random letter strings, unless specified.
